info.title: OPNsense API
info.description: Auto-generated OpenAPI specification for OPNsense 25.7.6. Includes Enum resolution and UUID path parameters.

post.description: return menu items for this user
list available backups for selected host
diff two backups for selected host
revert to local backup from history
download specified backup, when left empty the latest is offered

get.description: fetch an environment by uuid, return new when not found or $uuid equals null

post.description: Retrieve specific changelog in text and html format
Retrieve upgrade log hidden in system
Retrieve specific license for package in text format

get.description: retrieve upgrade status (and log file of current process)
list firmware mirror and flavour options

post.description: search phase 1 entries in legacy config returning a standard structure as we use in the mvc variant
search phase 2 entries in legacy config returning a standard structure as we use in the mvc variant
delete phase 1 including associated phase 2 entries
Update key pair with given properties
Add new key pair with given properties

get.description: Retrieve key pair or return defaults for new one
Returns the status of the legacy subsystem, which currently only includes a boolean specifying if the subsystem

post.description: Apply the IPsec configuration using the legacy subsystem and return a message describing the result
Add new preSharedKey with given properties

get.description: Retrieve key pair or return defaults for new one

post.description: Add new route and set with attributes from post

get.description: Retrieve route settings or return defaults for new one

post.description: Delete route by uuid, save contents to tmp for removal on apply
toggle, we can not use our default action here since enabled/disabled are swapped
delete / drop a specific state by state+creator id
drop pf states by filter and/or rule id

get.description: return rule'ids and descriptions from running config

schema.description: Object with dynamic keys or array of items

post.description: retrieve pf state amount and states limit

items.description: Dynamic object representing an item in the list
Dynamic object representing an item in the list
Dynamic object representing an item in the list

get.description: retrieve system-wide statistics for each network protocol
retrieve system-wide statistics for each network adapter
retrieve status/config for each network adapter
set new carp node status (enable, disable, maintenance)
set new carp node status (enable, disable, maintenance)
retrieve system-wide socket statistics (merge netstat with sockstat)
retrieve statistics recorded by the memory management routines

post.description: request timeserie data to use for reporting
request top usage data (for reporting), values can optionally be filtered using filter_field and filter_value

get.description: get metadata from backend aggregation process
request timeserie data to use for reporting

schema.description: Object with dynamic keys or array of items

get.description: retrieve SystemHealth Data (previously called RRD Graphs)
Retrieve network interfaces by key (lan, wan, opt1,..)
Retrieve network interfaces by key (lan, wan, opt1,..)

post.description: Add new lagg and set with attributes from post

get.description: Retrieve lagg settings or return defaults for new one

post.description: Add new bridge and set with attributes from post

get.description: Retrieve bridge settings or return defaults for new one

post.description: Add new gre and set with attributes from post

get.description: Retrieve gre settings or return defaults for new one

post.description: remap subnet and subnet_bits to network (which represents combined field)
remap subnet and subnet_bits to network (which represents combined field)
remap subnet and subnet_bits to network (which represents combined field)

post.description: As createCert updates the config, we need to collect that change in order to push it back

get.description: fetch (a new) revocation list for a given autority.

post.description: set crl for a certificate authority, mimicking standard model operations

get.description: Retrieve alert settings or return defaults
Retrieve service settings or return defaults
Retrieve test settings or return defaults
retrieve job settings or return defaults

post.description: add new job and set with attributes from post
delete job by uuid ( only if origin is cron)
validate user/model input for configurable options
store presets when valid and changed
kill session by source ip:port or common name

get.description: Retrieve destination settings or return defaults for a new one

post.description: Add new destination and set with attributes from post

get.description: Retrieve pipe settings or return defaults

post.description: Add new pipe and set with attributes from post

get.description: Retrieve queue settings or return defaults

post.description: Add new queue and set with attributes from post

get.description: Retrieve rule settings or return defaults for new rule

post.description: Add new rule and set with attributes from post
reconfigure shaper/ipfw, generate config and reload
Flush rule configuration to config and reload suricata ruleset (graceful restart)

schema.description: Object with dynamic keys or array of items

OptionFieldObject.description: Map of available options. Keys are the option values/IDs, values contain the display name and selection state.

pfsyncinterface.description: Interface selection. Keys are Interface IDs (e.g., 'lan', 'wan', 'opt1'). Returns a map of interfaces on read, expects a comma-separated string of Interface IDs on write.
